name: manscape
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to remove or cut a man's body hair in order to improve his appearance: Not all men manscape in the same manner or, indeed, for the same reasons. More and more men these days are getting manscaped.
More examplesFewer examples I appreciate the efforts of my partner to manscape.“I'm completely manscaped from head to toe - from the ears down - so that takes a bit of time,” the pro wrestler explained.We'll show you the best ways for super-hairy guys to manscape their body hair.
